aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: ETRUCK is committed to becoming a leading global commercial vehicle portal, providing customers with high-quality commercial vehicle solutions
aboutPage.companyDesc1: Founded in 2020, ETRUCK is a professional platform focusing on commercial vehicle import and export trade. We are committed to providing global customers with high-quality commercial vehicle products and services, integrating China's high-quality commercial vehicle resources to provide customers with one-stop procurement solutions.
aboutPage.companyDesc2: Our team has many years of experience in the commercial vehicle industry, with in-depth understanding of domestic and foreign market needs, and can provide customers with professional product recommendations, customized modifications, logistics and transportation and other comprehensive services. At present, our business has covered more than 20 countries and regions around the world.
aboutPage.missionDesc: To provide global customers with high-quality commercial vehicle products and services, and help customers maximize business value through professional solutions
aboutPage.visionDesc: To become a leading global commercial vehicle portal, set industry benchmarks, and promote the sustainable development of the commercial vehicle industry
aboutPage.valuesDesc: Professionalism, integrity, innovation, and win-win cooperation, always customer demand-oriented, providing service experience that exceeds expectations
aboutPage.teamSubtitle: Experienced professional team providing you with high-quality services
aboutPage.partnersSubtitle: Establish long-term cooperative relationships with industry-leading enterprises
aboutPage.cooperationDesc: Our professional team is always ready to provide you with consultation and services, let us find the best solution for your commercial vehicle needs together

teamPage.title: Professional Team
teamPage.subtitle: We have an experienced team of industry experts dedicated to providing you with the highest quality commercial vehicle solutions
teamPage.teamIntro: As one of China's leading commercial vehicle suppliers, we are proud to provide excellent customer service. Supported by a team of industry experts with professional knowledge, we provide tailored recommendations to help you choose the perfect truck for your business, ensuring optimal performance, efficiency and value.
teamPage.teamValuesSubtitle: The professional concepts we believe in together
teamPage.professionalDesc: Deeply focused on the commercial vehicle field, continuously improving professional skills, providing customers with the most professional services
teamPage.integrityDesc: Based on integrity, establish long-term trusting relationships, always putting customer interests first
teamPage.innovationDesc: Constantly learning and innovating, keeping up with industry development trends, providing better service experience
teamPage.excellenceDesc: Not satisfied with the status quo, continuously pursuing excellence, exceeding customer expectations
teamPage.contactExpertsDesc: No matter what your needs are, our professional team will provide you with the most suitable solutions
